short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for Last.fm service. Let's you look back in time - what you have been listening to in the past months and years.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wondered what have you been listening to at this moment last year? Do you wish there was a Memories function on Last.fm? (as is on Google Photos for example)

This extension can provide it. Just save your Last.fm username in the extension and whenever you feel like it explore your music history with just a few clicks.

There are two modes available - going back by steps (month, year, etc.) or freely exploring around specific date and time.
